txt.en: The herbs could use a little more grinding
The herbs are nice and ground
The mortar and pestle can be found near Galathir in the Houses of Healing.\n\nYou should grind the herbs with the mortar and pestle.

Tunglewort can be found in Osgiliath near the Anduin. Maiden's Helm can be found in the northern woods of Lossarnach. Wanderbeard can be found at the base of the mountains in Pelennor. Settlegang can be found in the woods of Talath Anor.\n\nYou should seek out these particular plants for Galathir.
Galathir can be found in the Houses of Healing on the southern end of the Sixth Circle.\n\nYou should speak with Galathir.
The mortar and pestle can be found near Galathir in the Houses of Healing.\n\nYou should grind the herbs with the mortar and pestle.

'As you are aware, battle is surely upon us. There will be casualties and there will be injuries. The casualties will be unavoidable. If we are to act fast and have the proper healing salves, we should be able to abate the injuries. I have been insisting that we stock up on herbs with healing properties but I do not know anyone who is willing to leave the safety of this city on the eve of battle. If you collect these plants, then I and many soldiers to come will be in your debt.'

Galathir shows you a book containing labeled drawing of several plants of the region with healing properties:

Tunglewort, a weed that grows in Osgiliath near the Anduin.
Maiden's Helm, a flower only found in the northern woods of Lossarnach.
Wanderbeard, a type of moss-flower growing at the base of the mountains in Pelennor.
Settlegang, a green flower-less plant found in Talath Anor.
Galathir, the Master Herbalist, seeks various plants from nearby lands to make potent healing salves. These will be important for healing soldiers after the coming battle.

'I am forever grateful for your efforts, as will any warriors injured in battle. I must say, you have a keen eye for finding outstanding herbal specimens. If you would, bring the herbs to the mortar and pestle and grind them up for me.'
'I must say, you have a keen eye for finding some outstanding herbal specimens.'
'You have done well. The other herbalists will take over from here and make potent salves. Thank you again for aiding the Houses of Healing.'
Galathir can be found in the Houses of Healing on the southern end of the Sixth Circle.\n\nYou should speak with Galathir.
Grind up the herbs a little more
Grind up the herbs with the mortar and pestle
